Sentencas: Solid oxide fuel cells remain at the forefront of research into electrochemical energy conversion technology.
Titulo: Thermal imaging of solid oxide cells operating under electrolysis conditions

Sentencas: More recent interest has focused on operating in electrolyser mode to convert steam or carbon dioxide into hydrogen or carbon monoxide, respectively.
Titulo: Thermal imaging of solid oxide cells operating under electrolysis conditions

Sentencas: The mechanism of these reactions is not fully understood, particularly when operated in co-electrolysis mode using both steam and CO2.
Titulo: Thermal imaging of solid oxide cells operating under electrolysis conditions

Sentencas: This contribution reports the use of a thermal camera to directly observe changes in the cell temperature during operation, providing a remote, non-contact and highly sensitive method for monitoring an operational cell.
Titulo: Thermal imaging of solid oxide cells operating under electrolysis conditions
